abstract: Human rights groups report that Syrian security forces have killed at least 40 people in the deadliest set of Friday antigovernment demonstrations across the country to date; protesters repeat an earlier demand for protection from the international community in with some going so far as to call for a no-fly zone.
snippet: Syrian opposition groups have asked for international aid, though only demonstrators went so far as to call for a no-fly zone.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Syrian opposition groups have asked for international aid, though only demonstrators went so far as to call for a no-fly zone.

headline.main: 40 Killed Across Syria in Deadliest Friday Demonstrations Since May
headline.print_headline: 40 Killed Across Syria in Deadliest Friday Demonstrations Since May
headline.seo: 40 Killed in Deadliest Friday Demonstrations Since May
